sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import sos from '../../res/song1.png'; import moon from '../../res/moon.png'; import './albumsp.css'; import { graphcms, ALBUM_POSTS } from '../../graphql/Queries'; const Albumsp = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { graphcms.request(ALBUM_POSTS) .then(res => setPosts(res.posts)) }, []); return (

ALBUM REVIEWS

{posts.length > 0 &&

{posts[0].title}

{posts[0].artist}

{posts[0].datePublished}

{posts[1].title}

{posts[1].artist}

{posts[1].datePublished}

{posts[2].title}

{posts[2].artist}

{posts[2].datePublished}

SOS

SZA

MAY 24, 2023

}
) } export default Albumsp
